auto_reply_desc: After enabling, reply with specified content based on keyword reply and message received reply rules. Priority: keyword reply > message received reply
keyword_reply_tip: Keyword reply content supports image-text links, text, images, links, and mini-program cards
continue_reply_tip: After enabling, continue to trigger message received auto-reply after keyword reply, then trigger robot reply
msg_close_warning: After closing, keyword and message received replies will no longer reply with specified content
